definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Yes, I would like to buy a pair of dress shoes.
sentences.chinese: 好啊，我想買一雙配洋裝的鞋。

sentences.english: Do you like this dress, Alice? Try it on.
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡這件洋裝嗎，愛莉絲？試穿看看嘛。

sentences.english: You look so elegant in that tight dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那件緊身洋裝看起來好高雅。

sentences.english: E. g. I'd like to take these dresses into a fitting room and try them on.
sentences.chinese: 我想把這幾件洋裝拿到更衣間試穿一下。

sentences.english: She kept on looking at the blue dress.
sentences.chinese: 她不停地注視着那藍色的洋裝。

sentences.english: This dress is suitable for her.
You will make a hit at the party in your new dress.
sentences.chinese: 你在宴會上穿上你的新洋裝，一定會獲得好評的。

sentences.english: Could I have this dress gift-wrapped, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能夠請你幫我把這件洋裝包起來嗎？

sentences.english: She wore a white dress with a lace border.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件有着雷絲滾邊的白色洋裝。

sentences.english: Amy is too busy to make her own dress.
sentences.chinese: 艾美忙得沒有時間做自己的洋裝。

sentences.english: I will sell them at the market, and with this money, I will buy a new drees .
sentences.chinese: 賣掉它們後，用所得的錢我能買一件新的洋裝。

sentences.english: Tina wore a very colorful dress to school today.
sentences.chinese: 蒂娜今天穿着色彩繽紛的洋裝到學校。

sentences.english: I'm going to make a dress next.
sentences.chinese: 下一次我要做一件洋裝。

sentences.english: Leon for beauty picked out a red dress dress.
sentences.chinese: 李昂爲麗人挑了一件紅色洋裝連衣裙。

sentences.english: We want to buy Womenswear , Suits, Dress, Trousers, Jackets, Coats, Blazers, Eveningdress.
sentences.chinese: 我們要採購洋裝，褲子，夾克，外套，晚裝。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
